jd_information.description: Basic concepts of accounting and general knowledge of QuickBooks Pro are a must, as well as experience in running a front office in a manufacturing environment. Ideal candidate has excellent communication and organizational skills in customer service. Job duties include but are not limited to: A/P, A/R, Payroll, Government remittances, HST, Foreign exchange, Exporting documents, Excel, Word, Reception, Invoicing, Bank reconciliation, Order processing. Training and office manual are available.
